titleStmt.title: SII 7.1039: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 1039. (A.R. No. 406 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīIrājeṉtiracoḻatevāṟku yāṇṭu 3vatu miṉanā
yaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣattu pañcamiyum caṉikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Urocaṇi nāḷ nittaviṉotavaḷanāṭṭu
viracoḻavaḷanāṭṭu brammadeśam śrīpūtiyāṉa Irācanārāyaṇacaturvvetimaṅkalattu Uṭaiyār tiru
kkiḷāUṭaiyār koyil Āticaṇṭeśvara tevarkaṉmikaḷom Irācarācavaḷanāṭṭu kiḻveṅkai
nāṭṭu perunallūruṭaiyār Araiyaṉ tiruvekampamuṭaiyārāṉa keraḷarāyaṟku nāṅkaḷ kaṭaiyiṭu kuṭutta
paricāvatu In nā ṟku nittaviṉotavaḷanāṭṭu Āvūrkūṟṟattu Irumputalāṉa coḻarājya
ttilatacaturvvetimaṅkalattār poṉkoṇṭu policaikku polivūṭṭu Ūṟkiḻiṟaiyili
yāka Ivvūr pi kai veṇṇukku teṟkku pirāṇaUpakārinallūril vīranārāyaṇavatikku kiḻa
kku kulottuṅkacoḻavāykkālukku teṟku 4m 5m 6m 7m 8m 3tuṇṭattum 4tuṇṭattum
Innilatte ḻānta paḻaveṇṇum Akappaṭṭa na m 8mā1/80 + 1/160 + 1/320 Innilam Eṭṭumāk kāṇi Arai
kkāṇi muntirikai pūvaṇūruṭaiyār coḻakaṅkarkāṇiyāy Innilam veṇpura nāḷil ve
ku ḻanmtarappaṭi Iṟukkappaṟṟāy kiṭantu potukaiyil Intap pūvaṇūruṭaiyār coḻakaṅkar
r Uṟavumuṟaiyārum Uḷḷiṭṭārpakkal Ivaṉ vilaikoḷkaiyil Innilam payircceyvittu Iṟukkalāmpaṭi ni
kulaimaṭaiyum Iṭṭu payirum meṟṟi kuṭimai Iṟukkiṟom Eṉṟu collukaiyil Innilam Eṭṭumāk kāṇi Araikkā
kaikkum Āṭṭaikku Iṟukka niccayitta 100 2 10ḷa Innellu nūṟṟuirupatiṉ kalamum Iṟukkumiṭattu kārile Oṉṟupā
pacāṉamutal nellil kāril Iṟukkum nellukku Oṉṟumukkāl maṟuvil Iṟukkavum nikkiniṉṟa nellu Oru pūvi
m Iṟukkummiṭattu nāṭṭukku Iṭṭa niṉaippu peṟavum niṉaippu nikkiṉ nellil Oṉṟupātiyāluḷḷa nellu Uḷḷur
Ūrkkālāle taraviṭu pūrikaic cilavākkavum nikkiniṉṟa nellukku talaiakappaṭi kācu Iṭavum Uṟaināḻi koyiṟṟamappeṟu
Uḷḷuṭṭuk kūṭṭuvaṉa kūṭṭātoḻiyavum tiṅkaḷttirunāḷ Āṭṭaittirunāḷkkaḷḷukku kuṭimaikku māttāl mukkuṟuṇiyā
ka vaṉta nellu taraviṭu nelloṭe kūṭṭic cilavākkuvatākavum kūraikkaṭṭaṇaṅkḷḷukku Iṭum vaikkollum kaṟ
ṟaiyum tavirakkaṭavatākavum Ippaṭi ceyyumiṭattu cantirādityavar ceyyakkaṭavatākavum cammatittuk kaṭaiīṭu kuṭuttom Ip
paṭi ceyyummiṭattu Ivvāṇṭu pacāṉamutal Iṟukkakaṭavatākac cammatittuk kaṭaiīṭu kuṭuttommi Ip
parunallūruṭaiyār Araiyar tiruvekampamuṭaiyārāṉa keraḷarāyarkku Ivvāticaṇḍeśvara de varkaṉmikaḷom Ivai ⌈
koyilkaṇakku cipūtiUṭaiyān tirukkiḷāUṭaiyāṉ tiruvāykulamuṭaiyāṉāṉa śrīmāheśvarapiriyaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai koyilkaṇa
kku cipūtiyuṭaiyāṉ mātevaṉ tirukkiḷāvuṭaiyāṉāṉa nāṟpatteṇṇāyirappiriyaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai
rāyam pullāli tirukkiḷāuṭaiyāṉ mātevaṉāṉa catācivapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai śaivācāriyam pirayākai Aḻakiya mātevapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai caivācāryyam cūriyateva
paṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai tevakaṉmi pañcanetivāṇapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai Irācarācapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai tevakaṉmi tirukkiḷāvuṭaiyāṉpaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu
Ippaṭikku Ivai kaṇṇuṭaimātevapaṭṭaṉ sayiññaiyātaṉamaikku Ivai neṟkuṉṟamuṭaiyāṉ Arumoḻitevaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai cimāheśvarakkaṅkāṇi piḷḷaiUṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 7.1039 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
